sentences.en: Inevitably, many lenders will foreclose on thehomeowner.
sentences.cn: 不可避免地, 许多贷款者会强行收回借款人的房产.

sentences.en: Note the importance of the issue to lending institutions foreclose, take title, and resell the property.
sentences.cn: 注意贷款惯例问题的重要性,其中包括取消赎回权, 享有所有权以及重新出售财产问题.

sentences.en: The bank foreclosed on the mortgage for his previous home.
sentences.cn: 银行取消了他先前住房的抵押赎回权。

sentences.en: The building society will be forced to foreclose.
sentences.cn: 建筑工会被迫取消赎回权.

sentences.en: They tried to foreclose the possibility of his meeting with the chairman.
sentences.cn: 他们设法排除他与董事长会面的可能性.

words.tran_cn: 阻止；排除；取消抵押品赎回权

trans.tran_cn: 阻止；排除；取消抵押品赎回权
trans.tran_en: if a bank forecloses, it takes away someone’s property because they have failed to pay back the money that they borrowed from the bank to buy it
if a bank forecloses, it takes away someone’s property because they have failed to pay back the money that they borrowed from the bank to buy it

trans.tran_cn: 取消（抵押品）赎回权，取消（抵押人的）赎回抵押品的权利，排除，阻止
